nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content: This workflow automates the synchronization of product data from a Shopify store to a Google Sheets document, ensuring seamless management and tracking. It retrieves product details such as title, tags, description, and price from Shopify via GraphQL queries. The outcome is a comprehensive list of products neatly organized in Google Sheets for easy access and analysis.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content: Schedule Trigger: Sets the timing for the automation to run, ensuring regular updates. Currently set to trigger every day at 7:00 AM

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content: BatchSize: Defines the number of products to fetch from Shopify at a time, optimizing data retrieval. Currently set to 100, but it can be adjusted to a maximum of 250 for a single run

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content: LastCursor: Checks if the last cursor data is already present in Google Sheets to facilitate incremental data fetching. This ensures that the synchronization process does not start from the beginning each time, optimizing efficiency by picking up where it left off

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content: Shopify-initial: Fetches the initial set of products from the Shopify store to start the synchronization process. This node will only run once if there is no cursor found in the previous node, which retrieves the cursor and the first set of products

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content: This code node merges data from different sources (BatchSize, LastCursor, and Shopify-initial) to ensure the synchronization process starts efficiently and picks up where it left off. It checks for available data and retrieves the last cursor position from Google Sheets to facilitate incremental data fetching.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content: The "Split output" node acts as a bridge between data retrieval and subsequent processing nodes. Since the Shopify node fetches batches of 100 results at a time, this node splits those batches into individual product entries, ensuring seamless processing and storage of each product's details in subsequent workflow steps

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note7

parameters.content: Set cursor: Updates the cursor for the next page of products to fetch from Shopify.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note8

parameters.content: The GraphQL query within this node is crafted to extract essential product details such as title, description, tags, and price. This query can be customized to fetch additional product information as needed for specific synchronization requirements.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Shopify to Google Sheets Product Sync Automation

## Overview
Automated workflow: Shopify to Google Sheets Product Sync Automation. This workflow integrates 10 different services: stickyNote, wait, code, scheduleTrigger, graphql. It contains 29 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 29
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Wait1**: wait
- **No Operation, do nothing**: noOp
- **Shopify get products**: graphql
- **Split output**: code
- **Check if there is next page**: if
- **writing first product details**: googleSheets
- **Set cursor**: set
- **writing remaning product info to google sheets**: googleSheets
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **update Curser**: googleSheets
- ... and 19 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
